course.subject: HUMA
course.name: The Zhuangzi and its Multimedia Reception in China and Beyond
course.description: The Daoist classic Zhuangzi, a collection of cryptic sayings and short anecdotes attributed to the mysterious Master Zhuang Zhou, has deeply influenced cultural life in East Asia. In this course, we explore both the Daoist classicâ€™s multifaceted content and its diverse reception history to understand why the text might have exuded such an incessant relevance for a wide range of audiences in East Asia and beyond.
